required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The TRANQUILITY 2 Trial: A Phase 3 Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease
clinical_study.official_title: The TRANQUILITY 2 Trial: Multi-Center Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel Design, Vehicle-Controlled Phase 3 Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of 0.25% Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Vehicle in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The TRANQUILITY 2 Trial: Multi-Center Randomized, Double-Masked, Parallel Design, Vehicle-Controlled Phase 2/3 Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of 0.25% Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Vehicle in Subjects with Dry Eye Disease

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Conjunctival redness assessed via digital photography over 90 minutes in the dry eye chamber
primary_outcome.description: Digital photography of conjunctival redness on a 0 to 4 (normal - severe) scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in tear reactive aldehyde species (RASP) levels after doses of test article

secondary_outcome.description: Day 1Measured using a sterile Schirmer's Test Strip

arm_group.arm_group_label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered 7 times over two consecutive days
Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered 7 times over two consecutive days

intervention.description: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered 7 times over two consecutive days
intervention.arm_group_label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered 7 times over two consecutive days

intervention.description: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered 7 times over two consecutive days
intervention.arm_group_label: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered 7 times over two consecutive days
